title: Language Education Design Workshop Based on Online Instructional Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical language proficiency enhancement program for entry-level workplace managers, featuring real-time collaborative task-centered education in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners will create a language learning activity design document by applying the five phases of the ADDIE model.
Learners will propose at least three strategies to enhance learner engagement using the ARCS motivation theory.
Learners will develop a language task design framework suitable for project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
